task: Change the page layout for part of a document
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the portion of the document for which you want to change the page layout.
Go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Setup' group, click on the 'Margins' button.
Choose the desired margin settings from the available options.
To apply the new page layout to the selected portion of the document, click on the 'Apply to Selected Text' button.
Review the changes and make any additional adjustments if needed.
